name: tm30
effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Teleport)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Hurls a dark lump at the foe. It may lower SP. DEF.
flavor_text.emerald: Hurls a dark lump at the foe. It may lower SP. DEF.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A shadowy blob is hurled at the foe. May also lower the foe’s SP. DEF.
